title: E2E: upgrade Vitest, add recorded-response E2E tests
description:
attached_molecule: ro-wisp-bvo
attached_at: 2026-02-15T05:43:50Z
attached_args: NEVER use EnterPlanMode. Implement directly. Do NOT enter plan mode under any circumstances.
dispatched_by: mayor

Enterprise E2E strategy (enterprise-arch/e2e-testing-strategy.md) requires RobinhoodIntegration to:

Phase 1 — Framework upgrade (prerequisite):
1. Upgrade Vitest from 1.6.0 to 3.2.4
2. Ensure all existing 119 tests still pass after upgrade

Phase 2 — Add E2E tests:
3. Create vitest.e2e.config.ts with node env, 15s timeout
4. Create recorded API response fixtures (JSON files with captured Robinhood API responses)
5. Implement scenarios: portfolio fetch with recorded response (P0), holdings transformation (P1), auth failure handling (P1), rate limit handling (P2), partial data response (P2)
6. No live API calls in CI — all E2E against recorded fixtures
7. Standardize npm script: test:e2e
8. Document E2E strategy and manual testing procedure in repo ARCHITECTURE.md
9. All tests must pass: npm run build && npm test && npm run test:e2e
notes: Implemented: Upgraded Vitest 1.6.0→3.2.4, added 14 recorded-response E2E tests (P0-P2), created vitest.e2e.config.ts, recorded fixtures, ARCHITECTURE.md with E2E docs, npm test:e2e script. All 119 unit + 14 E2E tests pass.
close_reason: Merged: Vitest upgraded 1.6.0→3.2.4, E2E recorded-response tests added. All 119 tests pass.
